member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing
member.summary: Contains extension methods for AForge imaging filters execution.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyFilter``2(``0[0:,0:],``1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image.
member.param: Execute in place or not. Please use this switch correctly as some filters may not be processed correctly.
member.returns: Processed image. In case is set to true, result is processed source image (can be discarded).

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseFilter)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image. As destination image size may be different from source in-place filtering is not allowed.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image. must copy an image if in place operation is requested, so it was decided that in-place filtering is not allowed.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseInPlaceFilter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image.
member.param: Execute in place or not. Please use this switch correctly as some filters may not be processed correctly.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseInPlacePartialFilter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image.
member.param: Execute in place or not. Please use this switch correctly as some filters may not be processed correctly.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyBaseTransformationFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseTransformationFilter)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image. As destination image size may be different from source; in-place filtering is not allowed.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyBaseTransformationFilter``2(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseTransformationFilter)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image. As destination image size may be different from source; in-place filtering is not allowed.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgeFilterProcessing.ApplyBaseResizeFilter``1(``0[0:,0:],Accord.Imaging.Filters.BaseResizeFilter)
member.summary: Executes specified filter on an image. As destination image size may be different from source; in-place filtering is not allowed.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.UnmanagedImageConversionExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for interoperability.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.UnmanagedImageConversionExtensions.AsImage(Accord.Imaging.UnmanagedImage)
member.summary: Converts unmanaged image to generic image (IImage) but without data copy. Format depends upon unmanaged image pixel format (e.g. 8bppGray -> [Gray, byte], 24bppColor -> [Color3, byte]...).

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.UnmanagedImageConversionExtensions.AsAForgeImage``1(DotImaging.Image{``0})
member.summary: Converts generic image to unmanaged image but without data copy.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion
member.summary: Contains extensions for conversion between Imaging.NET and AForge Point structures.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToIntPoint(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point)
member.summary: Converts Imaging.NET point to AForge.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPoint(DotImaging.Primitives2D.PointF)
member.summary: Converts Imaging.NET point to Accord.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPoint(Accord.IntPoint)
member.summary: Converts Accord.NET point to Imaging.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPointF(Accord.Point)
member.summary: Converts Accord.NET point to Imaging.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPoints(Accord.IntPoint[])
member.summary: Converts AForge.NET points to Imaging.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPoints(Accord.IntPoint[][])
member.summary: Converts AForge.NET points to Imaging.NET representation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.AForgePointConversion.ToPoints(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point[])
member.summary: Converts Imaging.NET points to AForge.NET representation.
